Question
========

A sample of 8 individuals was randomly drawn from a population in which a particular variable was measured. The scores of the individuals are: 8, 23, 15, 21, 11, 15, 19, 12. The standard error of the sample mean (SEM) is

Answerlist
----------

* 0.65
* 1.71
* 1.83
* 3.36

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.65: Incorrect
* 1.71: Incorrect
* 1.83: Correct
* 3.36: Incorrect
